message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This unique item holds immense value to me, and I am confident it will be equally beneficial to you. Given its worth to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. I understand that this might be a substantial amount, but I am willing to negotiate if you provide me with compelling reasons for a lower price. I am looking forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how we can reach a mutually satisfactory agreement. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.
